info.game_comments:
Ken Jennings game 63.
Ken gets his tenth consecutive correct Final Jeopardy! response.

(2, 1).clue: God breathed life into some of this to create Adam & told Adam he'd return to it

(2, 3).clue: In Chapter 41, Pharaoh tells Joseph about his dream about 14 of these, half fat, half lean
